description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Guide Skwug through 50 challenging levels using his unique ability to teleport through lasers, lavafalls and more. There are tons of fun awards to unlock, 6 unlockable level themes, and 4 power-ups to help you on your journey.
description.short: Guide Skwug through 50 challenging levels using his unique ability to teleport through lasers, lavafalls and more. There are tons of fun awards to unlock, 6 unlockable level themes, and 4 power-ups to help you on your journey.
